title: Kochi to Munnar Kerala Bliss
overview: Escape to the rolling hills and tea plantations of Munnar for a refreshing break.

itinerary.title: Arrival & Waterfalls
itinerary.desc: Drive from Kochi, visit Cheeyappara waterfalls.

itinerary.title: Munnar Sightseeing
itinerary.desc: Full day exploring tea estates and dams.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.desc: Morning walk and drive back to Kochi.
